attributes.action: Prohibit immigration into the UK from any Country who may pose a threat to UK
attributes.background: Prohibit immigration into the UK from any Country who may pose a threat to UK National Security irrespective of prospective immigrants' status. Government has a duty and responsibility to protect its citizens from any threat irrespective. The rights of the many outweigh the rights of the few.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We are not clear what you mean by "pose a threat to the UK". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
